column5: Seen sled tracks and footprints walking out into the bay. Anybody know if its safe yet?
tracks and foot prints?  See anyholes?  I'd bet its no more than a couple inches.
haha nope i didnt want to venture out until i knew somebody else had!
Did the tracks come back off the ice?  JF
Actually i lost sight of them before they ended :S
I'm sure there's been someone out there. I\d wait till you see a hut It wont be long.
Well like the other thread... chip.. step.. chip..step.. and in P harbour the next chip is probably a spring !!
Do you ever go out there irishfield? I mean for the ice fishing?
Not this early ! ..but ya I've been know to fish it.. Here's Krawler with the fish of the day on Jan 18th last year.

A friend of mine said he saw a person walking from the town dock towards Hindson Marina earlier in the morning on Saturday.  We went down to the dock around 1pm or so, to have a coffee and see if there were any other people on the ice.  Believe it or not there were 3 people who looked like they might be ice fishing out by Hinson Marine with two sleds parked on the ice.  There was another sled running the length of the ice heading north even though there was some open water by Magazine Island.   Not too many brain cells being used out there today.  Tom.
Did the tracks seem to come back to shore too
Perfect well hopefully by next weekend i can get out there myself!
